pages.title: Magnet Moficiation Table
pages.text: The Magnet Modification Table is used to $(l)upgrade$() a Magnet its $(l)Durability, Range, Velocity and Mana Efficiency$()

The costs to upgrade are paid with $(l)Vault Bronze, Magnetite Ingot, Red Vault Essence and Vault Plating.$() $(br2)The bar indicates the $(l)chance of success$() to apply a new upgrade, which decreases after each upgrade. $(br2)Be aware that using the Magnet Modification Table $(l)may break your magnet$().
